title: Masturbation never breaks your heart (but it might break your fingers). A theoretical approach.
abstract: We like to do it, but we don't talk about it and we don't even call it sex (of course it is!). It's an easy, feminist, free, healthy, relaxing, strengthening activity. Let's talk about solo sex in a respectful, empowering, fun workshop. All genders and experiences are welcome. No need to come ;)
